metadata.title: Yoto Player (2nd Generation) Adventure Jacket in Bumblebee Yellow â€“ Protective Sleeve Case Carrier for Kids Player, Silicone Skin Cover with Easy-to-Carry Handle, Accessory Gift for Children
features: PROTECTS YOUR YOTO PLAYER (2ND GEN): Prevent your Yoto Player (sold separately) from small bumps & damage with this Adventure Jacket whilst still having access to all features including the card slot, pixel display, dials, nightlight, charger & headphone ports!
EASY TO FIT & CARRY: The silicone sleeve fits snugly over the speaker & features a handle making it easier to carry from place to place, a sturdier option for little hands!
AVAILABLE IN 6 DIFFERENT COLOURS: Personalise your device with 1 of 6 eye-catching colours or use different colours to distinguish between multiple Players!

KID-FRIENDLY WITH PARENTAL CONTROL: Enjoy hours of screen-free entertainment with the Yoto Player. All Content is safe & has been specially chosen & created with children in mind. No cameras. No mics. No ads.
CONTENT THAT GROWS WITH KIDS' MINDS: Explore 1000+ Yoto cards of bestselling novels, music, fun activities, free podcasts, radio, soundscapes, timers or even create content with a Make Your Own card!
description: This silicone carry-coat fits snugly over your Yoto Player, protecting it from smalls bumps and making it easier to carry from place to place. With your Adventure Jacket fitted, you'll still have access to all of Yoto Player's features including the nightlight, buttons, charger and headphone port. Adventure Jacket also has a small lip on the front which lifts your Player's display off the ground when in nightlight mode. Personalize your Yoto Player with one of six eye-catching colors or use different colors to distinguish between multiple Players.
